tech.name: HTML
tech.description: is the most basic building block of the Web. It defines the meaning and structure of web content.

tech.name: CSS
tech.description: (Cascading Style Sheets) is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.

tech.name: Javascript
tech.description: is a lightweight interpreted programming language with first-class functions, a prototype-based, multi-paradigm, single-threaded, dynamic language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and declarative styles.

tech.name: Vue
tech.description: is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It builds on top of standard HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and provides a declarative, component-based programming model.

tech.name: Nuxt
tech.description: is an open-source framework with an intuitive and extendable way to create type-safe, performant and production-grade full-stack web applications and websites with Vue.js.

tech.name: Astro
tech.description: is the web framework for building content-driven websites like blogs, marketing, and e-commerce. Best-known for pioneering a new frontend architecture to reduce JavaScript overhead and complexity compared to other frameworks.

tech.name: Tailwind
tech.description: CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.

tech.name: Sass
tech.description: is a stylesheet language that’s compiled to CSS. It allows you to use variables, nested rules, mixins, functions, and more, all with a fully CSS-compatible syntax.

tech.name: Wordpress
tech.description: (WP, or WordPress.org) is a web content management system. Written in the PHP programming language and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database.

tech.name: Github
tech.description: is a cloud-based platform where you can store, share, and work together with others to write code.

tech.name: Figma
tech.description: is a powerful, collaborative design tool for teams.

tech.name: NPM
tech.description: is the world's largest software registry. The registry is a large public database of JavaScript software and the meta-information surrounding it.

tech.name: Pinia
tech.description: is a store library for Vue.js, it allows you to share a state across components/pages.

tech.name: Postman
tech.description: is an all-in-one API platform for building and working with APIs. It takes the pain out of every stage of the API lifecycle—from designing and testing to delivery and monitoring.

tech.name: Supabase
tech.description: is a serverless backend service provider and an open-source Firebase alternative. It allows you to build highly optimized and performant applications using Postgres backend with little configuration.

tech.name: Webstorm
tech.description: is a cutting-edge IDE that supports JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, including modern innovations like TypeScript, React, Angular, Vue.js, and Node.js.
